name: 劉益宏
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.
schedule:
Chapter 0: 基礎數學 (Basics of Mathematics)
Chapter 1: 控制系統簡介 (Introduction to Control Systems)
Chapter 2: 轉移函數及方塊圖 (Transfer function and Block Diagram)
Chapter 3: 穩定度 (Stability)
Chapter 4: 時域響應分析 (Time-domain Response)
Chapter 5: 根軌跡 (Root Locus)
Chapter 6: 頻率域響應分析 (Frequency-domain Response)
Chapter 7: 控制器設計 (Controller Design)
scorePolicy:
1.　　第一次期中考: 30%
2.　　第二次期中考: 35%
3.　　期末考: 35%
materials: F. Golnaraghi and B. C. Kuo, Automation Control Systems 中文版
